mapper.insert: insert into QNA(USER_ID, Q_SUBJECT, Q_CONTENT) values (#{user_id}, #{q_subject}, #{q_content})
mapper.select: select Q.QUESTION_ID, U.NICKNAME, Q.Q_SUBJECT, Q.Q_CONTENT, Q.ANSWER, Q.Q_CREATE_DATE from QNA Q, USER U where Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
select Q.QUESTION_ID, U.NICKNAME, Q.Q_SUBJECT, Q.Q_CONTENT, Q.ANSWER, Q.A_CREATE_DATE from QNA Q inner join USER U on Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID where Q.QUESTION_ID = #{question_id}
select Q.QUESTION_ID, U.NICKNAME, Q.Q_SUBJECT, Q.Q_CONTENT, Q.ANSWER, Q.Q_CREATE_DATE from QNA Q, USER U where Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID and U.NICKNAME like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
select Q.QUESTION_ID, U.NICKNAME, Q.Q_SUBJECT, Q.Q_CONTENT, Q.ANSWER, Q.Q_CREATE_DATE from QNA Q, USER U where Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID and Q.Q_SUBJECT like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
select Q.QUESTION_ID, U.NICKNAME, Q.Q_SUBJECT, Q.Q_CONTENT, Q.ANSWER, Q.Q_CREATE_DATE from QNA Q, USER U where Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID and Q.Q_CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
